Of course! it's all good unless your break rules, and you don't right 
now! Just one thing though; next time, send this kind of message over 
private email to someone in the council; it leaves more room for IC 
posts and it allows the other players to read only what's necessary.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jon Murray" <jon12ca@y...> wrote:
>    I came up with this idea for me and my brothers characters and 
> thought I should run it by the group first.
> 
>  Lets say the Maximals were working on some prototype bots called 
> Hunters. These robots specialize in hunting as the name implies and 
> are also very feirce Warriors. After completion of the bots the 
> Maximals began to place them with in Maximal ships one each that is 
> until The preds stole the Maxi ship which halted progress. Only two 
> of the bots were created and placed (myself and my brothers 
> characters) within the preds stolen ship and the maximals trailing 
> ship. Since the bots are top secret they would be known of by high 
> ranking bots and are hidden deep within each ship. Since the 
Hunters 
> are programed to follow orders they will probably take alegances 
with 
> whom ever wakes them up.
> 
> One last thing : My brother wishes to play a Beast wars type 
> character within the maximal ship and I wish to play a technorganic 
> within the pred ship. Is this possable?
